about_the_game:
Glimpse brings high quality dynamic 2D and 3D scenes rendered to your Windows desktop. Put your GPU to use by utilizing its idle power to display subtle and inspiring imagery while you work... or whatever it is you do while you aren't gaming. The goal is to provide curated and ongoing updates and new scenes so your computer can look its best. If you purchase this app, I sincerely hope you enjoy it.

Powered by Unity.

Features

  • Windows 10, 8 and 7 ( Aero required for Windows 7 )
  • Automatic pause when other applications are using the GPU
  • HI-res support
  • Low CPU usage
  • Lots of options for customization
